def_cn: 英语字母表的第 4 个字母
def_en: D is the fourth letter of the English alphabet.

def_cn: C 大调音阶中的第二音;D 音
def_en: In music, D is the second note in the scale of C major.

def_cn: (作业、考试成绩等的)丁等，D等，差
def_en: If you get a D as a mark for a piece of work or in an exam, your work is below average or poor.

def_cn: (用于墓碑上或工具书中等的日期前)
def_en: d. is an abbreviation for (缩略=) died when it is written in front of dates, for example on graves or in reference books.
d was a written abbreviation for (书面缩略=)penny or pence in Britain before decimal currency was introduced in 1971.

def_cn: (用于首字母为 d 的一些单词的缩写，如 day, defeated或district）
def_en: D or d is used as an abbreviation for words beginning with d, such as 'day', 'defeated', or 'district'.
